Name: Ground Movement
Description: A basic training in movement skill allow the hero to perform Slide attack while running on the ground with high knockdown capability.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: Further training in movement technique allow the hero to perform Tackle attack while running on the ground with high knockback capability.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: With utmost intensive training, equipments’ weight no longer affect the hero’s ability to move around.

Name: Ground Movement
Description: A perfect skill in ground movement allow the hero to completely dodge incoming attack while running.

Name: Air Movement
Description: Training in air movement allow the hero to jump again midair.

Name: Air Movement
Description: The hero is trained to counter the weakness of being on the air, they are much more resistant to be knockdown.

Name: Air Movement
Description: With a bit of help from magic and training, the hero can now hover in the air to reduce falling speed while also able to move around.

Name: Double Piercing
Description: A set of quick double stabs with a higher minor chance of a critical hit. A feat performed only by skilled swordsmen.

Name: Triple Piercing
Description: Swift triple stabs with a higher moderate chance of a critical hit. The speed becomes much more difficult to see by untrained eyes.

Name: Quadruple Piercing
Description: Quadruple stabs of unmatched speed with a higher moderate chance of a critical hit. Only those of inhuman eyes can see through this movement.

Name: Speed Piercing
Description: Surpassing the speed of master swordsmen, uncountable stabs within a few seconds with a higher chance of a critical hit. The hero also seems to become faster afterwards for a short time.

Name: Unseen Piercing
Description: Into the realm of invisibility, it is impossible to illustrate each stab of this relentless attacks. The hero becomes seemingly immune to all damage during this move.

Name: Counter Attack
Description: A skilful parry and counterattack against incompetent attack from enemies by comparison. Quite a risky move with a high reward.
A brutal counterattack against those foolish enough to attack. The close distance also lets the hero draw a significant amount of blood from the victims. Almost vampiric in nature.

Name: Vital Slash
Description: A small slash to a vital body part is enough to draw a pool of blood on the ground. Inflict bleeding and have a higher moderate critical hit chance.
